title: Nurse Soraka
body: obviously dressed up as a nurse. but whenever she get the speed boost to get close and heal someone, she has sirens going off. maybe on her sleeves or even a helmet. sorta like how vi gets them when she ults for her police skin.

replies.body:
http://31.media.tumblr.com/84ef137ed521dee2d0245d9d8f8a94de/tumblr_nemy92wrku1sbaqxto1_1280.gif

This is all I can think of. :D
so much yes! When her passive is active sirens should be blaring and any minions along the way stop moving and pull over to the side to make way.
lol maybe the minions dont pull over, but yes all the way cx
That's tight. She could throw band-aids instead of nanners.
How dare you suggest she throw anything but bananas.
i was thinking of this idea last night but more of a blitzcrank skin even though riot biltz exists which im sure his sirens go off....im not sure.
Star Guardian Soraka, lulu, Diana, Leona Syndra and Taric
No...... too many annoying sirens already.
we should get a nurse soraka for the nepal incident...
